casebody.data:
Upon the PETITION OF Lynette Anne HEIMS, Petitioner-Appellant, No. 17-1799 Court of Appeals of Iowa. Filed January 9, 2019

And Concerning Brad Francis Heims, Respondent-Appellee.

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION See Iowa R. App. P. 6.904

A former spouse appeals from the district court's order terminating spousal support and modifying child support obligations. AFFIRMED.

AFFIRMED.
